long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Angry Turds is a free and fun game right on chrome. The gameplay is simple and enjoyable. Your job is to destroy all the blue animals and win. The game will also have levels that help you participate in more upgrades
